20110114162552.000|20110114162554.000|CC1|        FOR LONG PERIO          
20110114162554.000|20110114162556.000|CC1|   NSAIDS, INCLUDING CELEBREX,  
20110114162556.000|20110114162556.000|CC1|  INCREASE THE CHANCE OF SERIOUS
20110114162556.000|20110114162558.000|CC1|    SKIN OR ALLERGIC REACTIONS
